Name: Sacrificial Lighthouse
About the game: Sacrificial Lighthouse is a small but atmospheric story that wonâ€™t leave you indifferent. You play as a girl named Maya, who finds herself on a strange island with a lighthouse during a storm. What is this strange place? How and why did you get here? Do you dare to find out the truth and what you are willing to sacrifice for it? Features: - Psychological story-thriller with quest elements. - Gorgeous hand-drawn 2D graphics and 2D animations. - Atmospheric musical score. - A game with an overwhelming storyline that will crush your heart, leaving behind a gaping void of hopelessness. - You will have something to think about as you progress through the game, and the branched finale will make you realize the consequences of the choices we make every day.
